mapper.insert: insert into city.administrator(username, password, name, gender, affiliation, privatePhone, email, officePhone, qqNumber, address, postcode) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{affiliation}, #{privatePhone}, #{email}, #{officePhone}, #{qqNumber}, #{address}, #{postcode})
mapper.update: update city.administrator set name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, privatePhone = #{privatePhone}, email = #{email}, officePhone = #{officePhone}, qqNumber = #{qqNumber}, address = #{address}, postcode = #{postcode} where id = #{id}
update city.administrator set password = #{password} where id = #{id}
